about_the_game:
Hell Hold’em is a unique roguelike turn-based RPG that blends the strategic depth of Poker with intense combat mechanics and a dark, infernal setting. Players assume the role of The Magician, navigating a metaphorical labyrinth of Hell to rescue a soul unjustly condemned. Each encounter turns into a deadly Poker game where players use a combination of hand management, special card abilities, and tactical decisions to outwit demonic foes. With its distinctive hand-drawn, expressionist art style and rich narrative, Hell Hold’em offers a fresh, challenging twist on the roguelike genre.

  • Poker-Based Combat: Engage in strategic, turn-based battles using poker hands and unique powers.

  • Roguelike Mechanics: Navigate diferent paths with permadeath for a fresh, challenging experience each time.

  • RPG Elements: Level up and gain new powers, better hands, new suits for your deck, and additional special cards.

  • Hand-Drawn Art Style: Immerse yourself in a striking world with dark, surreal hand-drawn visuals.

  • Narrative Exploration: Uncover a gripping story centered on rescuing a damned soul with branching paths.

  • Varied Gameplay: Engage in challenges and side quests to unlock special cards and items that will aid you on your journey.

  • Twist the rules. Use powers to cheat at the Poker table: transform one card into another, destroy your enemies’ cards, draw new cards, and more.

  • Choose your path. Explore an abstract representation of Hell by choosing your path through a one-way labyrinth.

  • Varied opponents. Each demon you face is unique, with its own strengths, weaknesses, and wits.

  • Narrative Elements: Uncover the story of the Infernal Deck by defeating demons and continuing your journey through Hell.

  • Replayability: Different paths lead to the center of Hell. Maybe next time it’s better to try a different route.
